00010 void EDLUTFileException::display_error() const {
00011 
00012         char msgbuf[160];
00013         if(this->GetErrorNum()){
00014                 sprintf(msgbuf,"Error while: %s",this->GetTaskMsg());
00015                 fprintf(stderr,msgbuf);
00016                 if((this->GetErrorNum() & 0xFF) == 1){
00017                         sprintf(msgbuf,"In file line: %li",Currentline);
00018                         fprintf(stderr,msgbuf);
00019                 }
00020                 
00021                 sprintf(msgbuf,"Error message (%08lX): %s",this->GetErrorNum(),this->GetErrorMsg());
00022                 fprintf(stderr,msgbuf);
00023                 sprintf(msgbuf,"Try to: %s",this->GetRepairMsg());
00024                 fprintf(stderr,msgbuf);
00025         }
